sentence: While football great Herschel Walkers bid for the U.S. Senate hinges on his celebrity, hes just as likely to bring up his reputation as a businessman on the campaign trail.
author: Greg Bluestein
title: Herschel Walkers business record reveals creditor lawsuits, exaggerated claims

sentence: Whenever Georgia needed somebody to speak up for their businesses, they called Herschel Walker, he told supporters at a recent rally in Dahlonega.
title: Herschel Walker (R), "If evolution is true, why are there still apes? Think about it.

sentence: DAHLONEGA Taking the stage of a packed gym in the foothills of North Georgia, Herschel Walker gave the audience exactly what they wanted: a raft of conservative campaign promises, including a pledge to rid the state of Democratic U.S. Sen. Raphael Warnock.
author: Greg Bluestein
title: Cruise control? Walker ignores rivals, aims for Warnock ahead of May primary
